NavBar.title: Laf is an open-source project, we need your Star

HomePage.slogan: Write Your Code, Like Write Blog
HomePage.content1: Laf is a cloud development platform integrating functions, databases and storage

Ability.title: Features
Ability.functionSub: , release your first function in 5 seconds.
Ability.databaseSub: , no need to create a database, ready to use out of the box.
Ability.storageSub: , create your own cloud storage, and manage files is simpler.

Choice.title: Advantage
Choice.openSub: Laf follows the Apache License 2.0 open source protocol
Choice.fastSub: There is no cold start time to make your request respond faster.
Choice.simplesub: No need to care about Ops, Everything is Serverless.
Choice.cheapSub: Million calls, only $0.01 to see more price plans
Choice.service: Provide efficient services for all developers.

Join.title: Join the laf developer community
Join.subtitle: Grow up with us
Join.content: Here you can experience the latest version of Laf at the first time and keep communicating with developers and users in Slack or WeChat groups.

Footer.laf: Laf provides cloud functions, cloud databases, object storage and other capabilities, writing code like a blog! Launch the ChatGPT app in 3 minutes!
